text:
Hello,

I'm currently using the scheduler function in Thread Group. 
However, I have multiple thread groups. It comes tedious to make repeat setting 
these schedulers. 

If possible, can you please add a scheduler to Test Plan.

The test plan scheduler can act as a master scheduler and 
the thread group schedulers can be setup to override the test plan scheduler
for that specific thread group.

Keep up the good work.

wish I had a better way to thank you then just saying thanks.

Take care,
